question.title: Instantiate a class from within apk package then call a Java function from it using unidbg?
question.body:
I use the following statement in unidbg to resolve a class from within an apk package:

SampleClass = vm.resolveClass("path/to/class");

Then, I use the SampleClass.callStaticJniMethodObject() and similar functions to call native methods within a shared object. Is possible to call a Java function from within that class instead of a native function. Thanks.
